title: TICK-L stack not able to detect/predict anamoly.
body:
I am using TICK-L stack (ver 1.5.0) to find anomaly in briquettes consumption data for steam generation. I get data once per day. So, for one year we have 365 days * 1 = 365 data points and trained the model with 9 years data, 2009 - 2018. once it's trained, I haven't noticed any abnormal or anomaly window in training data. 
![data explorer](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291662-d2ddb300-1801-11ea-9a20-b50fc0425b69.png)
![Baseline](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291620-afb30380-1801-11ea-836c-9d49c3598dbe.png)

Then i tried to predict the anomaly from 2019-Jan-01, But there is no anomaly predicted or shown in the chronograf dashboard. For reference attached the screenshots and configuration files.
![Prediction](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291636-bf324c80-1801-11ea-9e35-5136354a8ed9.png)

**### My loudml.yml file:**
---
datasources:
  - name: influx
    type: influxdb
    addr: influxdb:8086
    database: mydb
  - name: kapacitor
    type: influxdb
    addr: kapacitor:9092
    database: from_loudml

storage:
  path: /var/lib/loudml

server:
  listen: 0.0.0.0:8077


So please let me know
**1.why it didn't raised the anomaly even though the data not falls under the min,max range. 
2.What is the use of annotations? where does loud ml stores it.
3.I have inserted the data in IST timezone, but query always uses UTC time zone. will it make any impact in prediction?
4.What is prediction interval and offset? Does it needs to be changed in my use case?
5.For model configuration attached the screenshots.Whether configuration needs to be changed?**
![md-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291475-2e5b7100-1801-11ea-8067-a335729cc2c2.png)
![md-2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291551-81352880-1801-11ea-9608-c9898a415359.png)
![md-3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291552-81352880-1801-11ea-9c25-ebc00fc23b5b.png)
![md-4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291554-81cdbf00-1801-11ea-8dc7-e0d6a5b07f5a.png)
![md-5](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291556-81cdbf00-1801-11ea-8b86-5a5a2df19199.png)
![md-6](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22852268/70291557-82665580-1801-11ea-8e02-f59d84a8f90c.png)

Thanks in advance.
